related_post.text: someone know if i can make it so I can hover on the point with matplotlib?

so_post.text: @Ovicron with some effort yes. Here's a so that I usually reference for that <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7908636/possibletomakelabelsappearwhenhoveringoverapointinmatplotlib>I would also recommend pyqtgraphs for native interactivity python charts
